title: Nobel Peace Prize Calligraphy
content:
I haven't seen this posted...it's Obama's Nobel Prize.  
Beautiful calligraphy, I assume hand-lettered.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022070920im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0nobelprize09_4835.jpg)

I wonder how I could simulate something like this, if I don't have the skill to do it with pen and ink. Maybe with Canada Type's [Maestro?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022070920/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/maestro/)?
author: dinazina

comments.content: It’s hand lettered by Inger Magnus, I believe. At least she [did](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022070920/http:/nobelpeaceprize.org/en_GB/about_peaceprize/diploma/) Kofi Annan’s peace price in 2001, and the lettering looks just like it.

Kerstin Ankers?

You are probably right... it is not the more angular work that I associate with KA.

Michael
